scripts.dev: lessc css/main.less dist/css/main.css && lessc css/resume.less dist/css/resume.css && webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.prod: lessc css/main.less dist/css/main.css && lessc css/resume.less dist/css/resume.css && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build-prodj: lessc --clean-css="advanced" css/main.less dist/css/main.css && lessc --clean-css="advanced" css/resume.less dist/css/resume.css && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js -p
